subject: RE: mobile acoustics update
preview: Hi Lucy, Confirming the AP30's have been removed: https://acoufelt.com/au/product/table-solutions-u-divider/https://acoufelt.com/au/product/table-solutions-l-divider/

full_threads.body:
Hi Lucy, 

Confirming the AP30's have been removed: 

https://acoufelt.com/au/product/table-solutions-u-divider/
https://acoufelt.com/au/product/table-solutions-l-divider/

@heath just to clarify, this 2 color should we removed?

>AP30 Natural Duo
>AP30 Natural Single

Also what name of the said regular white?
Thanks

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body: @manuel can you please action this? Thanks

Looking good Heath!

Although will need to remove these two (‘AP30’) colours from the swatches on the product pages but re-add our regular ‘white’ colour:




Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

I think with this mix of photography and renders across our colours this should be enough quality visual content to start pushing this out. Are you also cool to share your other photos via dropbox? I’ll work with Leah to start incorporating these into the flyer and downloads as well.

Great worth Heath and team!

Heath! Love it!! Your photos are excellent – are you able to share these with @Leah Zahorujko | Acoufelt <mailto:leah.zahorujko@acoufelt.com> as well so that she can start working on adding the solid colours to these?

My only comment is now for the AU site we need to show that these are available in our full colour range – not sure if this is something we should integrate into both the landing page and the product pages but definitely into the product pages.

If you were to put it in the landing page as well you could almost replace the bottom ‘quotes’ section with rolling swatches or something for selection? Do you think the quotes are an important feature at this stage?

Thanks for your hard work heath!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
